data.title: Dhaakad: Articles, Photos, Videos & More
data.meta_description: Dhaakad - Check out latest updates, news, articles, photos, videos, stats, history, and more information about Dhaakad exclusively on MensXP.
data.text:
As photos of Ranbir Kapoor and Sai Pallavi get leaked from the Ramayana set, here’s why Kangana Ranaut didn’t want him to play Lord Ram in the film.

Dive into the flavors of Bihar with Sattu, the superfood that's rocking not just taste buds but health charts too! Click to know more.

Days after getting bashed by Mukesh Khanna for being in contention to play Shaktimaan, Ranveer Singh now faces another blow as Farhan Akhtar has delayed Don 3 to reportedly focus on his acting career by doing an action film.

Arjun Rampal’s latest release Crakk co-starring Vidyut Jammwal has failed to impress the audience. With the failure of Crakk, Arjun has now delivered 13 flops in a row. Interestingly, his last success was the 2011 superhero film Ra.One co-starring Shah Rukh Khan.

Here is the spoiler-free review of Vidyut Jammwal, Arjun Rampal, and Nora Fatehi's high-octane action film Crakk, directed by Aditya Datt.

Kangana Ranaut starrer Tejas has incurred heavy losses of over Rs 50 crore at the box office. Reportedly, the film earned only Rs 4.25 crore in India.

Kangana Ranaut’s latest release Tejas has turned out to be an epic box office failure. The film will now fail to hit the Rs 10 crore mark at the box office. It’ll be Kangana’s 4th film in a row to fail to breach the meagre lifetime number followed by Chandramukhi 2, Dhaakad and Thalaivii.

This article talks about Vikrant Massey’s ‘12th Fail’ beating Kangana Ranaut’s ‘Tejas’ at the box office clash between the two films. Tejas has managed to only earn over Rs 2.50 crores.

Kangana Ranaut’s latest release Tejas is turning out to be another box office disaster for the actress as it may struggle to hit Rs 1 crore on day 1. Tejas is all set to be Kangana’s 11th flop in a row. Just last month, Kangana starred in Tamil flop Chandramukhi 2.

Kanagana Ranaut has continued her tirade against Karan Johar and his film ‘Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani,’ by training her sights on the film’s lead Ranveer Singh. In a recent post, the Manikarnika actress gave unsolicited advice to Singh, telling him to “stop getting influenced by Karan Johar and his dressing sense.”

The trailer for Radhika Apte’s ‘Mrs Undercover’ makes one wonder if we’re ready for a female action hero after Kangana Ranaut's ‘Dhaakad’ failure’.

Recently, reports of Thalaivii film distributor Zee Studios demanding a refund of Rs 6 crore from the makers of the Kangana Ranaut starrer surfaced online. The actress has now refuted the report and has hit back at the “film mafia” calling it “propaganda”. She also asked her fans to “ignore the changu mangu gang” in a separate post.

this article talks about Bollywood actors which should be cast in an action thriller. List includes names like hrithik roshan, prabhas, Samantha ruth prabhu, kangana, Deepika padukone.

After being absent for almost 2 years, Kangana Ranaut is back on twitter and she just took her fans by surprise as she tweeted, “Hello everyone, it’s nice to be back here” and her fans are very excited

We're used to seeing actresses in more traditionally feminine roles, so it's always a pleasant surprise to see them take on a badass persona. Their action-packed performances leave us in awe of their talent and strength. Since Deepika Padukone is not the only Bollywood actress who knows how to kick butt on the big screen, we discuss five more actresses who have amazed us with their action sequences.

From Rajkummar Rao, Kangana Ranaut, Vidyut Jammwal, Ayushmann Khurrana, Akshay Kumar, Sidharth Malhotra to Taapsee Pannu, a look at 7 talented “outsiders” who continue to struggle at the box office with back-to-back flops. This shows, audience should be blamed for it & not Bollywood which is often accused of promoting nepotism.

Arjun Rampal has portrayed some of the most iconic villains in films like Ra-One and Om Shanti and even received a National Award for his performance in Rock On. But the actor did not see the face of ‘superstardom’ that he deserved. Recently, fans decoded the reason for his fading stardom

From Prabhas’ Radhe Shyam, Akshay Kumar’s Samrat Prithviraj, Aamir Khan’s Laal Singh Chaddha, Ranbir Kapoor’s Shamsher, Ranveer Singh’s Cirkus, Kangana Ranaut’s Dhaakad, Chiranjeevi’s Acharya To Hrithik Roshan & Saif Ali Khan’s Vikram Vedha, 9 stars who delivered biggest flops of 2022.

From Akshay Kumar, Kangana Ranaut, Aamir Khan, Aayushmann Khurrana, Varun Dhawan, Rajkummar Rao, Emraan Hashmi to Ranveer Singh, here are 8 once successful Bollywood stars who are not struggling at the box office with back-to-back flops.

After failing to deliver a single hit in Bollywood in the last 8 years or so, Kangana Ranaut is now heading south with her upcoming Tamil film Chandramukhi 2. The actress has replaced Jyothika in the sequel to the 2005 horror comedy hit starring Rajinikanth in the lead role. Chandramukhi & Bhool Bhulaiyaa were both remakes of Malayalam film Manichitrathazhu.

Sooraj Barjatya’s latest directorial Uunchai starring Amitabh Bachchan, Anupam Kher, Boman Irani, Sarika, Neena Gupta, Parineeti Chopra & Danny Denzongpa has recorded a phenomenal opening weekend at the box office. The film has surprised everyone by collecting in double digits taking down many mid-budget films of the year.

Kangana Ranaut, in a recent interview, opened up about the massive failure of his last release Dhaakad at the box office as she said that the Indian audiences failed to identify the westernised character she played in the film & that nowadays only films rooted in Indian culture are working at the box office citing examples of Kantara & PS-1.

Kangana Ranaut is confirmed to play the lead role in Pradeep Sarkar’s biopic on theatre superstar Noti Binodini, However, back in 2020, he was rumoured to be in talks with Aishwarya Rai for the same role.

Pushkar & Gayatri's 'Vikram Vedha' has finally released today (September 30). Here's how social media users are reacting to the film featuring Hrithik Roshan and Saif Ali Khan in the lead roles.

While filmmakers are announcing Hindi remakes of hit South films almost every day, a few Bollywood stars like Kangana Ranaut & Ranbir Kapoor haven’t yet featured in Tollywood remakes despite delivering flops.

The teaser of Parineeti Chopra’s new film Code Name Tiranga has released online. The film features Parineeti in an action-packed avatar & also features Hardy Sandhu, who was last seen playing Madan Lal in Ranveer Singh starrer 83. The Ribhu Dasgupta directorial releases on October 14.

Director Hansal Mehta recently praised Ranbir Kapoor’s ‘Brahmastra’. However, a Kangana Ranaut fan replied to the tweet and slammed him for giving a flop film to her. Here’s how the filmmaker reacted.

After the massive box office success of Gangubai Kathiawadi, RRR, Darlings & now Brahmastra, Alia Bhatt has emerged the biggest Indian star leaving the likes of Deepika Padukone & Kangana Ranaut far behind. The actress is on an all-time career high with back-to-back record-breaking hits.

Aamir Khan’s Laal Singh Chaddha turned out to be a major box office flop, folding its run around Rs 60 crore. While the film has been a huge flop, Ranveer Singh’s 83 & Kangana Ranaut’s Dhaakad still remain the biggest bombs in the history of Hindi cinema.

Bollywood must learn from box office failure of ‘Laal Singh Chaddha,’ ‘Raksha Bandhan,’ ‘Liger’ & stop over-promoting films

After ‘Manikarnika: The Queen Of Jhansi’, Kangana Ranaut is donning the director’s hat for ‘Emergency’ based on Indira Gandhi. ‘Pardes’ girl Mahima Chaudhry is now in the film’s cast. Her first look is out now.

During the 2007-2008 era, Bollywood actor Arjun Rampal was a part of several hits including SRK’s ‘Om Shanti Om’ and ‘Rock On’. Several rumours of him being bisexual were also doing the rounds back then.

this article talks about hindi movies which incurred a loss of over rs 70 crores at the box office. List includes dhaakad and 83.

In his autobiography, An Unsuitable Boy, Karan Johar had mentioned how as a kid he used to think that speaking Hindi is "downmarket & uncool" and would stay away from the likes of Aditya Chopra who'd speak only in Hindi. The statement has resurfaced online now and Kangana Ranaut has slammed the filmmaker.

John Abraham & Arjun Kapoor starrer Ek Villain Returns has scored a decent opening weekend at the box office. Also starring Disha Patani & Tara Sutaria, Mohit Suri directorial is one of the rare Bollywood films post-pandemic that has shown some promise at the box office.

This article talks about Vikran Rona star Kichcha Sudeep comparing Bollywood films flopping to virat kohli being out of form.

Recently, Kangana Ranaut starrer Dhaakad released in theatres and turned out to be a massive box office disaster. Now, Taapsee Pannu's latest release Shabaash Mithu has made even less money than Dhaakad. Despite that, Kangana's film is a way bigger disaster due to its high budget.

After delivering flops in a row, Kangana Ranaut is all set to bounce back with her next directorial titled Emergency. In the film, she plays the character of former Indian Prime Minister Indira Gandhi and has recently revealed the first look poster and teaser as "the most powerful and controversial women in the history of the world".

In a recent interview, noted actor Saswata Chatterjee opened up about the failure of his recent release Dhaakad starring Kangana Ranaut, Arjun Rampal & Divya Dutta. He revealed that even he couldn't watch the film on the big screen as it was removed from theatres soon after its release due to a lack of audience.

Actress Kangana Ranaut recently took to her Instagram account to post stories about dissing movies like Gangubai and Jug Jug Jeeyo, by calling them ‘flops’. Here is how the internet reacted.

After producing Kangana Ranaut's 'Dhaakad', producer Deepak Mukut has now signed Jacqueline Fernandez for his next venture. It is going to be the biopic of veteran filmmaker-action Chetan Anand. The actress will be playing the role of Anand's partner Priya Rajvansh in the project.

Aditya Roy Kapur's 'Rashtra Kavach Om' has failed badly at the box office. The action thriller, produced by Ahmed Khan, will be finishing its theatrical run under Rs 6 crore which is almost double of what Kangana Ranaut's 'Dhaakad' earned at the box office.

Kangana Ranaut's 'Dhaakad' has turned out to be one of the biggest disasters of all time. There's a buzz that the film's producer sold his office to pay investors. Here's what he said about the ongoing rumours.

Director Hansal Mehta worked with Kangana Ranaut in the 2017 release 'Simran'. Five years after the film's debacle, the filmmaker has called working with the actress a 'massive mistake'. Check why he said that.

This article talks about brand new releases on OTT platforms like Netflix and Prime video. List includes koffee with karan and vikram.

In a recent interview, Vidyut Jammwal is all praise for Kangana Ranaut & her 'spectacular' action scenes in 'Dhaakad' which bombed at the box office. He said he was 'proud' of her and in response, Kangana equated Vidyut's praise to an award & called him 'best action hero in the country'.

While 'Gangubai Kathiawadi', 'The Kashmir Files', and 'Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2' have set the cash registers ringing, many Bollywood films that were released this year turned out to be epic disasters. Some of them even failed to cross the Rs. 10 crore mark at the box office. Let's take a look at some of these movies here.

Kangana Ranaut took to Instagram and shared a throwback picture of veteran actor & yesteryear superstar Dharmendra. Along with the picture, she wrote about appreciating Dharmendra's "beauty". The veteran actor responded to Kangana's love with "jeeti raho".

Producer Mukesh Bhatt has expressed his opinion about the back-to-back failure of Bollywood films stating that today's producers and directors are more concerned with economic strategies than with their films, claiming that "no one makes a movie nowadays, everyone trades".

Nushrratt Bharuccha starrer Janhit Mein Jaari failed to attract the audience in theatres and has seen poor collections ever since it released on June 10. However, the low-budget film that wasn't promoted well has still made more money that Kangana Ranaut starrer big budget action film Dhaakad.

Kangana Ranaut's 'Dhaakad' turned out to be a huge disaster at the box office. As per the latest buzz, the makers of the Kanaga-led spy thriller face will suffer a huge loss of arounf Rs 78 crore. The film even failed to earn Rs 5 crore in its theatrical run.

this article talks about Kamal Haasan’s Vikram beating the box office records of Baahubali 2, KGF 2, RRR in Tamil Nadu .

Recently a spoof video went viral on social media where Qatar Airways CEO was supposedly reacting to a boycott call for his airlines by a man named Vashudev. Funnily enough, Kangana Ranaut fell for the parody video and started slamming the CEO in her Instagram stories even calling him an "idiot of a man".

From Tiger Shroff starrer 'Heropanti 2', Kangana Ranaut starrer 'Dhaakad', Akshay Kumar starrer 'Bachchhan Paandey' to Prabhas starrer 'Radhe Shyam', Here's a Look at 5 worst films released in the first half of 2022.

Kangana Ranaut has finally broken her silence after two weeks on the failure of 'Dhaakad'. Taking to social media, the actress revealed that she sees "lots of curated negativity". Here's all you need to know.

As Akshay Kumar's most ambitious film till date Samrat Prithviraj releases, a section of people on social media have been calling for its boycott. And the reasons range from "hypocrisy" of Akshay Kumar, hatred for Bollywood in general and also the issue of late actor Sushant Singh Rajput.

Actress Kangana Ranaut begins work on her next directorial film after ‘Manikarnika’. This is soon after her film ‘Dhaakad’ flopped at the box office and did terribly.
